text: int main ( void ) { int limit ; int stepCount ; int i , j , index ; int maxSum , bSum , rSum ; int pathPtr ; int input ; int sum [ MAX ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & limit ) ; for ( index = 0 ; index < limit ; index ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & stepCount ) ; maxSum = bSum = rSum = pathPtr = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < stepCount ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & input ) ; if ( j == pathPtr ) { bSum = maxSum + input ; } else if ( j == pathPtr + 1 ) { rSum = maxSum + input ; } } if ( rSum > bSum ) { pathPtr += 1 ; maxSum = rSum ; } else { maxSum = bSum ; } } sum [ index ] = maxSum ; } for ( index = 0 ; index < limit ; index ++ ) { printf ( "%d\n" , sum [ index ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
